content:
« Gecko Roles Page

Description

A text object uses for passwords, or other places where the text content is not shown visibly to the user.

Mapped to

  • AT-SPI: ROLE_PASSWORD_TEXT
  • ATK: ATK_ROLE_PASSWORD_TEXT
  • UA: NSAccessibilityTextFieldRole
  • MSAA/IA2: ROLE_SYSTEM_TEXT

Used by

  • HTML: <input type="password"/>
title: ROLE PASSWORD TEXT
